title: Battat – Wonder Wheels – Blue Toy Camper Van – Toy Rv For Kids, Toddlers – Realistic Details – Recyclable Materials – Camper Van – 1 Year +
features: Surfaces up! This classic, retro-style toy Truck for kids is built for imaginary road trips in the playroom!
Pop the top! Roof opens for easy access to the toy vehicle detailed interior
Bold pastel colors and a surfboard on the hood make this toy bus the coolest Ride at the beach
Pretend play toy: helps develop motor skills, social skills, and sparks imaginative roll play.
Tiny hands friendly: Wonder wheels Toy cars and trucks have soft and rounded edges Perfect for little hands
